attributes.action: stop making food without gluten wheat etc in the same factory what handles it
attributes.additional_details: It's on most food products also on lots of crisps
attributes.background: It's not fair whatsoever that celiacs can't eat certain foods because it's handled in a factory that also handles wheat gluten barley soya etc when it does not have these ingredients in' if they wasn't handled like this celiacs could eat more

rejection.details: If you want the UK Government and Parliament to make it illegal to produce gluten-free products in the same place as gluten products, we could accept a petition asking for that.
